FuncDef:
The static-user route-static urpf enable command enables URPF in static user+static route scenarios.
The undo static-user route-static urpf enable command restores the default configuration.
By default, URPF is disabled in static user+static route scenarios.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In static user+static route scenarios, if the next hop of the static route is the IP address of a session user who has the same MAC address as other session users, other session users fail to go online after the session user goes online. To resolve this issue, run the static-user route-static urpf enable command to enable URPF in static user+static route scenarios.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
